name: Memory Torches
description:
Archaeologist and explorer who never was afraid from the dark decided to enter the deep mine that had not been touched for years.  

Explore an old mine full of  traps and unknown mysteries, go deeper and see for yourself what happen with the mine. Solve puzzles and think about every step that you make, you never know when it can be your last, and always remember to keep the checkpoint light always with you !

The Pre-Alpha will be available soon. Wanna be part of the game or get the game early ?  

Join our DISCORD.
